domain.description: Entity Service top level domain, every item that is in Entity Service should be in this domain

text:
In a call with investors on Wednesday, Tesla CEO Elon Musk went on an unscripted tirade against coronavirus lockdowns, calling them unconstitutional, outrageous and fascist.

"I would call it forcibly imprisoning people in their homes," he said.
https://t.co/EL3wCHWkxr
